variants.description: The M17 is an army issued semi-automatic, short recoil operated pistol derived from the SIG Sauer P320.

The M18 is a compact, semi-automatic, short recoil operated pistol derived from the SIG Sauer P320 Carry, used by US Armed Forces.  Practically the same as its big brother, the M17, in every respect, the M18 features a moderately shorter slide and barrel which terminates at the end of the frame rather than extending partway beyond it like the M17.
